name: DemonAxe
description:
This game was made as part of the "Miz Jam 1" game jam, in which the goal is to create a game in 48 hours (non-consecutive) using only the specified pack of art assets.

Much thanks goes to Kenney for creating this art pack!
https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack

I created the music and sound effects myself.

Note that the game is rather unfinished in some areas, i.e. there is nothing to spend the coins you collect on.
